3: If we want to go to the control center next, we need to take the main passage. But...
Darn. That AI shut the airtight valve...
All terminals nearby are covered in that thick, black matter. We don't have enough firepower to force open this airtight valve...
I knew it was you... Leave immediately.
Watanabe? If we can receive his comms, he must be not far away...
Get away from that valve... Now!
A large howling sound travels all the way from the other end of the passage.
Bullets and explosions start to blast the airtight valve.
Watanabe is piloting an aircraft... in the passageway...
Tsk. Didn't manage to destroy it completely.
Watanabe opens his cockpit. He glances at Gray Raven and jumps off.
The next moment, his aircraft collides with the valve, causing a fiery explosion behind.
While Watanabe lands on the ground without a scratch...
